about_the_game:
◆Meet mysterious monks, reliable Taoist friends around you
In the spiritual realm of Zhongzhou, there are abundant natural treasures, and five races of people, ghosts, demons, monsters, and immortals coexist. Getting rid of the "heavenly tribulation" of birth, aging, sickness and death is the long-cherished wish of monks of all races. As the famous head of the immortal sect, it is your mission to recruit talents, create magic weapons, strengthen the immortal sect, and resist evil cultivation. To achieve the mission, you cannot do without the help of monks of all races. The story between you is about to begin.

◆I am the head and I make the decision. Please call me a magic weapon refining artist
Only by relying on extraordinary magic weapons that match your own cultivation can you become an immortal. The main contradiction in the world of Zhongzhou is the contradiction between the growing demand for magic weapons and the backward refining technology. Upgrade your immortal sect buildings, increase the acquisition of resources, unlock new magic weapon maps, improve the skills of craftsmen, and obtain more exquisite magic weapons!

◆No trade, no acquaintance, PY transaction between you and me
Whether it is the monk NPCs of various races in the game, or other masters like you, they may come to trade magic weapons with you. Our goal is: no magic weapon will be wasted! Through continuous transactions, the trust between you and the monk NPCs and other masters will continue to deepen, making the Zhongzhou spiritual realm more prosperous.
